name: Trade Routes (VinciDa)
description:
Trade Routes is a puzzle game for the GMTK 2021 game jam, on the theme of 'joined together', in less than 48 hours. 

The goal is to connect all houses via trade routes. The trade routes are build using a given set of materials for each level.

Controls:
- Use the top number keys on your keyboard, to use the corresponding material.
- A green arrow will always display, where you are currently building.

The games UI is made for 1920x1080, and has not been tested for other resolutions, just a heads up:)
